presentation: As a very creative person, autonomous learning has always been a powerful way to teach myself how to create videos, photos, games: with a computer and some passion, nothing is impossible.

This is how I have been fascinated by computer sciences through its ability to challenge the limits of nowadays society. To me, curiosity is the key to learning and mastering new technologies, as well as their application domains.

These convictions guided me here and push me every day to strengthen my knowledge. I am particularly fond of anything related to the web and hope to discover new technical and social aspects of the developer world.

Thanks to my training and experiences, I can position myself as a FullStack developer using DevOps and following agile methods. I still feed my curiosity with some personal projects and professional opportunities.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
description: While finishing my studies, I did an internship at Takima, a service company that puts a lot of efforts in making consultants strong technically. I had the opportunity to receive a complete 8 weeks formation about backend, frontend, devops and agile concepts, both theoretically and practically.

Thereafter I joined Jawg Maps, a french start-up making cartography services competing with Google Maps for B2B. I spent most of my time building their documentation site from scratch, which is now available at jawg.io/docs

I then carried out a first mission of a year and a half which brought me many skills in different technologies and processes. Today I am pursuing my second mission as a fullstack developer in the energy sector.

experiences.title: Blockchain Study project
experiences.description: With a team of colleagues from my school, we joined the innovation branch of Talan during a few months. We built a meetup platform based on the blockchain to permit the management of events, while adding a reliable reputation system of users in order to curb absenteeism.

experiences.title: Angular Web Developer Intern
experiences.description: Relief Applications mission is to provide innovative solutions for humanitarian organizations all over the world. I spent 5 months mostly working on the front-end of a Beneficiary Management Platform that aims to facilitate the management of beneficiaries in developing countries, for the PIN organization.

educations.title: General engineering program
educations.description: Currently completing my fifth year of study at EPF through the Majoring in Engineering & Digital Technologies. Graduation expected in end of 2020.

certifs.title: OCA: Oracle Certified Associate
certifs.description: Official certification demonstrating a foundational understanding of Java.
